channel.title: Diary Blog on Portfolio website for Jenny Jin
channel.description: Recent content in Diary Blog on Portfolio website for Jenny Jin

item.title: A Trip to Yangshuo, Guilin
item.description: During the “National Break” in China, I travelled to Yangshuo county, which is under jurisdiction of Guilin.

item.title: Celebrating National Day and Mid-autumn Festival on the same day
item.description: This year is so special. Firstly, it is the first year I can celebrate Mid-autumn Festival with my family.

item.title: POP MART -- The Blind Box Economy
item.description: What is Blind Box? The cute Alice and Wonderland toys depicted in the image above are what I got from the blind boxes series.

item.title: Become Mater of Your Time—Reflection on Time Management Workshop
item.description: Problem 1: Barely Say No to Others’ Request What I have done poorly in the Past: The biggest problem for me is I don’t say no when others come to me and ask me for help.

item.title: Investment Fundamentals Project--Kelly Criterion
item.description: Our group had a meeting today about what we want to do for the investment fundamentals project, which requires us to come up with our own investment strategy.

item.title: My first Data Analytics Workshop
item.description: We got our first assignment on the second day of the class, which makes me feel excited.

item.title: Learning Tidyverse and Creating my First RMarkdown
item.description: Throughout July and August, MFA students have to learn many pre-programme courses including Finance, Accounting and some other courses teaching hard skills.
